projects.title: RAG_SIMP
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a retrieval-augmented generation system for intelligent conversation.
 - Modular architecture for enhanced flexibility.
 - Optimized for edge devices with quantized LLMs.

projects.title: LLM Agent
projects.bodyText:
- Created a modular architecture for autonomous agents using LLMs.
 - Integrated LoRA and QLoRA-based models for task efficiency.
 - Experimented with reinforcement learning for continuous improvement.

projects.title: E-commerce Optimization
projects.bodyText:
- Enhanced backend systems for a high-traffic e-commerce platform.
 - Focused on customer experience optimization across multiple devices.
 - Reduced latency by optimizing database queries and APIs.

projects.title: CLIN-based Experiments
projects.bodyText:
- Conducted experiments based on the CLIN architecture.
 - Focused on exploration aspects in text-based simulators.
 - Modified architecture for improved agent behaviors.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis Model
projects.bodyText:
- Built a sentiment analysis model using a TF-IDF vectorizer and IMDb dataset.
 - Achieved high accuracy through feature engineering.
 - Developed interactive Colab notebooks for demonstrations.

projects.title: GitHub.io Research Website
projects.bodyText:
- Designed a personal website to showcase AI research.
 - Features agent initialization and LLM loading themes.
 - Highlights projects on autonomous agents and intelligent systems.
